children.name: Public Speaking
children.description: Traveled to various client offices across the US to present to employees about their retirement and equity plans as well as savings strategies

children.name: Project Management
children.description: Managed large (up to $1M) custom web application projects, such as total rewards and wealth accumulation statements, retirement projection tools and financial transactional sites

children.name: Client Management
children.description: Served as the primary point of contact for multiple client relationships, listening to the current initiatives and challenges faced by our clients and discussed strategic and demographic implications related to the plan redesign, strategy, administration and financing of their employee benefit programs

children.name: Staffing
children.description: Managed the staffing of all projects across our East Coast regional offices: Boston, New York and Raleigh

children.name: People Manager
children.description: Held monthly 1-on-1 meetings to discuss workload management, career development, educational goals and performance improvement

children.name: Recruitment
children.description: Supported leadership in attracting, developing and retaining talent by directing recruitment efforts, reviewing resumes and presenting at colleges and career fairs

children.name: Actuarial & Financial
children.description: Managed large (up to $1M) custom web application projects, such as total rewards and wealth accumulation statements, retirement projection tools and financial transactional sites

children.name: Data Anaylses
